articles.title: Heart inflammation link to Pfizer and Moderna jabs - BBC News
articles.description: But European regulators say the benefits of Covid vaccines continue to far outweigh the risks.
articles.content:
By James GallagherHealth and science correspondent
image copyrightGetty Images
Heart inflammation is a "very rare" side-effect of the Covid vaccines made by Pfizer and Moderna, according to regulat… [+2623 chars]

articles.author: Helen Collis
articles.title: EU regulator: mRNA coronavirus vaccines possibly linked to heart swelling - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The regulator’s safety committee analyzed 145 cases of myocarditis and 138 cases of pericarditis after the BioNTech/Pfizer vaccine.
articles.content: The mRNA vaccines from BioNTech/Pfizer and Moderna are possibly linked to rare cases of heart inflammation, according to analysis of 321 cases post-vaccination released Friday by the European Medicin… [+2115 chars]

articles.title: OPPO designs what might be its take on the Android gaming phone - Notebookcheck.net

articles.content: OPPO has recently updated its Reno smartphones with the latest 6 series. Now, it seems the OEM is working on a new variant for the line - albeit one with a very different rear panel than usual. Accor… [+846 chars]

articles.title: Soccer-England face disciplinary probe over laser pen shone at Schmeichel - The Star Online
articles.description: (Reuters) -     European football's governing body UEFA opened disciplinary proceedings against England on Thursday over a laser pen shone at Denmark goalkeeper Kasper Schmeichel during the deciding moment of their Euro 2020 semi-final.
